text: Rear Admiral Alan Green (born 19 December 1952) is a retired South African Navy officer who served as Chief: Military Policy, Strategy and Planning for the South African National Defence Force. He retired in 2012. His awards and honours include the Medal for Distinguished Conduct and Loyal Service for 40 years service. He commanded the Warrior class strike craft (previously SAS Kobie Koetzee) in 1988.http://152.111.1.87/argief/berigte/dieburger/1988/07/23/3/2.html ==References== Category:South African admirals Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Alan Green (admiral)
